title: James Argent 'banned from easyJet' after runway incident on trip with ex Gemma Collins
text:

James 'Arg' Argent has reportedly been 'banned from easyJet' after an incident in which he tried to cross the runway to the plane.

The 31-year-old reality TV star was holidaying with his now ex Gemma Collins earlier this year, when he arrived at the airport late, following a night of partying.

Arg was told on arrival that he could not board the plane as he had missed the flight but the former TOWIE star had other ideas.

With Gemma already aboard, Arg reportedly decided to take matters into his own hands and broke through a fire exit to make a dash to the plane.

A source told The Sun that "it was a really strange situation," and that this was the "beginning of the end" for his relationship with Gemma.

(Image: Ken McKay/ITV/REX)

(Image: REUTERS)

The source continued to say that Arg had been "partying hard," and even though they were meant to be on a break from each other, "it was a sign of things to come."

The police were called to the incident on the tarmac and it has been reported that they were not impressed with Arg's actions.

Neither were EasyJet it seems, with them reportedly placing a two-year ban on him flying with them.

(Image: Ken McKay/ITV/REX)

(Image: Ken McKay/ITV/REX/Shutterstock)

It is not the first time that James has been escorted from a flight, as he was asked to leave a plane in 2014 after a crazy time in Ibiza.

This led to him being sick all over himself after he had been on a 'massive bender'.

Mirror Online has contacted James Argent's representatives for comment. EasyJet have also been contacted for comment.

description: The former TOWIE star has reportedly been given a two-year ban by the airline following the incident which involved the police
